casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antonio L. RIPLEY. No. 489A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2005. Thomas R. Sallenger, Wilson, for Antonio L. Ripley. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of September *5302005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of September 2005."
